pages.text: McAlister's Deli Mt. Pleasant, SC ORDER NOW ORDER CATERING Information 644-A Long Point Rd Mt. Pleasant , SC 29464 Phone (843) 284-2288 Hours McAlister's Deli Mount Pleasant Welcome to McAlister's Deli in Mt. Pleasant, SC. Join us for hand-crafted sandwiches, fresh salads, ginormous spuds, and our Famous Sweet Tea. Once you're here, relax and let us handle the rest. Services DELIVERY CATERING GIFT CARDS HAVE A QUESTION? ASK US TODAY! Mt. Pleasant's Favorites Check our favorite soups, salads, sandwiches and more Broccoli and cheddar soup Warm up with a bowl of delicious broccoli and cheddar soup. Start Order McAlister's club Our spin on this classic club features Smoked turkey, Black Forest ham, bacon, sharp cheddar, Swiss, spring mix, tomato, mayo and McAlister's Honey Mustard on wheat. Includes a side. Start Order Garden Salad Tuck in to freshness with tomato, cucumber, cheddar-jack and croutons on mixed greens. Start Order McAlister's famous tea Nothing quenches like our tea. For tea lovers, or anybody who loves the idea of a refreshing pick-me-up at a ridiculously great value, we created the Tea Pass. 30 days of tea, starting at $7.99.
